about.title: About Me
about.intro: üëã Hey, I'm Reald! A passionate frontend developer who loves turning ideas into sleek, interactive experiences. My go-to tool? React! I'm always exploring best practices to build modern and high-performance user interfaces.
about.internDescription: Currently working on innovative web solutions, focusing on React development and modern frontend practices. This experience has been instrumental in applying theoretical knowledge to real-world projects and working in a professional development environment.
about.achievement1: Strengthened my skills in React and state management.
about.achievement2: Optimized API calls for better performance.
about.achievement3: Collaborated with backend developers, gaining insights into API-first architectures.
about.motivation1: I'm always on the lookout for ways to improve and level up my skills. Right now, I'm diving deeper into advanced React concepts to push my frontend development further.
about.motivation2: Inspired by epic tales and Chinese culture üèÆ, I see web development as a legendary journey‚Äîone filled with learning, challenges, and creative problem-solving‚Äîjust like Sun Wukong's adventures.

solar.title: Solar - Energy Dashboard
solar.subtitle: Smart dashboard for solar energy
solar.description: Solar is a web application developed with React to visualize and manage solar energy production and consumption data. Connected to a Django Rest Framework backend, it offers a smooth and intuitive interface allowing users to monitor their solar installations in real time.
achievements: Complete frontend integration with React and API request management with React Query.
Performance optimization through efficient rendering and optimized state management.
Smooth communication with backend to retrieve and display energy data in real time.
Design of an intuitive user interface, facilitating navigation and data analysis.
solar.whyImportant: This project allowed me to deepen my skills in advanced frontend development, API call optimization and collaboration with a structured backend. It also gave me a better understanding of issues related to smart energy systems.
solar.status: Development in progress - Beta version expected Q2 2024

musicPlayer.title: Music Player
musicPlayer.subtitle: Advanced Media Player
musicPlayer.description: üéµ MyPlaylist ‚Äì A lightweight and performant media player. A playlist player inspired by VLC, allowing easy playback of audio and video files with a simple and smooth interface.
features: Advanced controls (pause, play, fast forward, volume).

featureCards.continuousDesc: Enjoy smooth playback without interruptions with support for multiple audio formats.
featureCards.playlistDesc: Create and organize your own playlists for a personalized listening experience.
featureCards.advancedDesc: Adjust the equalizer and manage volume for optimal audio quality.

musicPlayer.whyImportant: This project allowed me to deepen my skills in advanced frontend development with React and TypeScript. I also learned to manage multimedia files, implement custom playback controls and design a responsive and pleasant user interface.
